snippet.title: Sophia the Traveler Arrives on Steam & Nintendo Switch on April 11!
snippet.description:
Sophia the Traveler, a wholesome hidden object adventure, will be available on #Steam and #Nintendo Switch on April 11!🚢
#indiegame 

Join Sophia the Traveler in this delightful hidden object adventure, traverse through winding water alleyways of Venice, uncovering hidden secrets and quirky Easter eggs amidst the ancient buildings and bustling crowds. Get ready for an unforgettable adventure that captures the essence of Venice like never before!

The game contains -

⚓10 distinct stages.
⚓1800+ character assets.
⚓300+ sets of character animation.
⚓100+ sequence animation & SFX.
⚓Nearly 300 very cute sound effects.
⚓100+ European buildings (8 iconic buildings of Venice included).
